questions: What was the major change that occurred occurred in the political and constitutional scenario due to French Revolution in Europe ?
answers: The French Revolution led to the transfer of sovereignty from the monarchy to a body of French citizen.

questions: What was the main aim of the French Revolutionaries ?
answers: The main aim of French Revolutionaries was to create a sense of collective identity amongst the French people.
